== Everyone's Invited ==

Team meetings are open to anyone interested in current team activities.  All team members are encouraged to attend.  

== Your Topic Matters ==

If you would like to discuss something that is not shown on the agenda, feel free to add it so it will be covered.

== More Info ==

As of 2014, <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-us-or/meetings/|meeting announcements, agenda]]</nowiki>, and <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-us-or/meetings/history/logs|logs]]</nowiki> can be found at the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-us-or|LoCo Portal]]</nowiki>.
